fishes.name: Yamabuki Ogon
fishes.description: A brilliant golden koi with a lustrous metallic sheen. Known for bringing prosperity and good fortune.

fishes.name: Kohaku
fishes.description: The classic red and white koi. Symbolizes success in career and life.

fishes.name: Chagoi
fishes.description: A friendly bronze-colored koi. The gentle giant known for its calm temperament.

fishes.name: Tancho
fishes.description: Distinguished by the circular red marking on its head. Represents the Japanese flag.

fishes.name: Shiro Utsuri
fishes.description: A striking black and white koi with bold patterns. Brings balance and harmony.

fishes.name: Goshiki
fishes.description: The 'five-colored' koi with a complex pattern. A mysterious beauty with hidden depths.

fishes.name: Kikusui
fishes.description: A platinum koi with red accents. Symbolizes perseverance and strength.
